thread.title: Genelia And Riteish Deshmukh Celebrate Five Years Of Marriage With These Adorable Instagram Posts
thread.title_full: Genelia And Riteish Deshmukh Celebrate Five Years Of Marriage With These Adorable Instagram Posts

author: Naina Chaturvedi
title: Genelia And Riteish Deshmukh Celebrate Five Years Of Marriage With These Adorable Instagram Posts
text:
Genelia And Riteish Deshmukh Celebrate Five Years Of Marriage With These Adorable Instagram Posts These two. ❤️️ Naina Chaturvedi Editorial Producer, HuffPost India NEW! HIGHLIGHT AND SHARE   Genelia D'Souza/ Instagram ADVERTISEMENT 
There is little doubt that Genelia D'Souza and Riteish Deshmukh are among Bollywood's most loved star couples. After dating for almost a decade, the Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya actors and screen heartthrobs finally tied the knot on 3 February, 2012. 
The couple is celebrating five years of marriage today and have marked the occasion with appropriately lovey-dovey social media posts addressed to each other. 
Posting a "huggable" picture of herself with Riteish, Genelia wrote: 
"I will always hold onto you so tight and that's because I know something so amazing doesn't happen twice..Happy Anniversary @riteishd .. thank you for changing the meaning of "Home" from a place to a person for me.." A photo posted by Genelia Deshmukh (@geneliad) on Feb 2, 2017 at 2:51pm PST 
The doting husband posted an equally sweet message for his "Baiko," meaning wife in Marathi: 
"I look at you & find my self, a stronger self, a better self, a happy self, a blessed self. Happy Anniversary Baiko." A photo posted by Riteish Deshmukh (@riteishd) on Feb 3, 2017 at 12:00am PST 
The couple are proud parents to two sons, Riaan and Rahyl. 
Check out these lovely pictures of the couple.
